downloadTitle: Windows MultiPoint Server 2010 Planning Considerations Guide
downloadDescription: This document addresses factors to be considered when planning to deploy Windows® MultiPoint™ Server 2010 or Windows® MultiPoint™ Server 2010 Academic.
detailsSection: This document addresses factors to be considered when planning to deploy Windows® MultiPoint™ Server 2010 or Windows® MultiPoint™ Server 2010 Academic. The considerations addressed in this document include the following: Capacity Planning for MultiPoint Server, Site Planning, Stations, Hubs, and USB Devices, Network Considerations and User Accounts, and Storing Files with MultiPoint Server.
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
